properties.name: vis.pgp.plain.in.dir
properties.description: Input directory for "plain" (unencrypted) files.

properties.name: vis.pgp.enc.out.dir
properties.description: Output directory for encrypted files.

properties.name: vis.pgp.enc.in.dir
properties.description: Input directory for encrypted files.

properties.name: vis.pgp.plain.out.dir
properties.description: Output directory for decrypted files.

properties.name: vis.pgp.publicKey.file
properties.description: PGP public key.

properties.name: vis.pgp.publicKey.userid
properties.description: Public key user id.

properties.name: vis.pgp.privateKey.file
properties.description: Private key file.

properties.name: vis.pgp.privateKey.userid
properties.description: Private key user id.

properties.name: vis.pgp.privateKey.password
properties.description: Private key passphrase.

properties.name: vis.pgp.file.enc.enable
properties.description: Enable/disable file connector for ecryption.

properties.name: vis.pgp.file.dec.enable
properties.description: Enable/disable file connector for decryption.

properties.name: vis.to.sftp.password
properties.description: Password that should be used for the destination SFTP connection.

properties.name: vis.to.sftp.dir.path
properties.description: Directory where a file should be placed on the destination SFTP server.

properties.name: vis.to.sftp.port
properties.description: Port that should be used for the destination SFTP connection.

properties.name: vis.to.sftp.hostname
properties.description: Hostname that should be used for the destination SFTP connection.

properties.name: vis.to.sftp.username
properties.description: Username that should be used for the destination SFTP connection.

properties.name: vis.to.sftp.in.dir
properties.description: Source directory for files that will be sent to SFTP.

properties.name: vis.to.sftp.enable
properties.description: Enable/disable transport route from file to SFTP.

properties.name: vis.from.sftp.out.dir
properties.description: Destination directory for files from SFTP.

properties.name: vis.from.sftp.password
properties.description: Password that should be used for the source SFTP connection.

properties.name: vis.from.sftp.dir.path
properties.description: Directory from which a file should be taken on the source SFTP server.

properties.name: vis.from.sftp.port
properties.description: Port that should be used for the source SFTP connection.

properties.name: vis.from.sftp.hostname
properties.description: Hostname that should be used for the source SFTP connection.

properties.name: vis.from.sftp.username
properties.description: Username that should be used for the source SFTP connection.

properties.name: vis.from.sftp.enable
properties.description: Enable/disable transport route from SFTP to file.
